item.description: 1st Class, Tuesday Review: the scale from objective to interpretive Interpretive scholars: put all the experiences (from them/the participants) to create meaning and multiple realities Objective scholars: put the theory out of the maths/models Different standards 1. But most of the times, it will predict very well. How to define the prediction: the confidence interval in quantitative research - 95%
